NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Legal insurance and all-risk insurance services

SHORT_DESCR.P: Services this Tender is for a range of legal services covering all aspects of the business such as development, housing management, conveyancing, governance, employment, care etc. The Contracting Authority sought suitably qualified and experienced legal firms to provide high quality Legal Services supported by robust structures, management, skilled staff and effective efficient processes. Tenderers needed to demonstrate that they have the requisite staff skills and knowledge, infrastructure, resources and procedures already in place to perform the services to the standard required by the organisation.

TITLE.P: Joint Ventures, Strategic Land and Regeneration
Governance, Employment and General Commercial Matters

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: Option to extend for a further 1 + 1 year.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTOR.ADDRESS: Witan Gate House, 500-600 Witan Gate West

1st floor, Witan Gate House, 500-600 Witan Gate West

TITLE.P: Joint Ventures, Strategic Land and Regeneration
Governance, Employment and General Commercial Matters

INFO_ADD.P: Lot 6b — Upon evaluation of available options L&Q have chosen not to award any contracts related to a potential in-housed model plot sales (Lot 6b). In line with paragraph 4.2 of the ITT part 1 document L and Q have chosen to continue with the present outsourced model (Lot 6a).
